price: 21. Allah asila kokana été: Nakolonga ngai na batindami na ngai. Ya sólo Allah azali makasi atonda nguya.
arabic: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kataba al-lahu la-aghlibanna anā warusulī inna al-laha qawiyyun ʿazīzun
